subtitles.text: A celebrity is a person who has the ability to perform.

I was going to repeat what I just said. Surprisingly, I didn't remember.

If there's one thing idols and comedians have in common...

I wanted everyone to see that kind of attitude.

I had to express myself in this short performance.

No, I'm an idol.

and a professional kendama player taught me how to play kendama.

If you play kendama hard for 100 days

I'm glad you took the trouble to understand that I'm doing that.
